question_text:
Look at this shape:
Which image shows a rotation?
backend_description: The image shows a purple triangle on a coordinate grid. The triangle has a horizontal base and points upward and to the right. It serves as the original figure to compare with other triangles to determine which option could be a rotation of it.
question_type: Multiple Choice Question with Single Answer
image_choice_tags_backend_description: This image shows the same purple triangle after a 90° counterclockwise rotation. The triangle has a vertical base and the top vertex pointing to the left.
This image shows the purple triangle translated vertically upward. The shape has the same size and orientation as the original triangle but is now positioned higher on the grid by 1 unit.
This image shows the purple triangle reflected across a vertical red line. The triangle is now facing the opposite direction. The red line indicates the line of reflection.
solution: Now find the image that shows a rotation.
Image A shows a rotation. Rotate the shape 90° counterclockwise. Image A is the correct image.
Image B shows a translation. Translate the shape up 1.
Image C shows a reflection. Reflect the shape across a vertical line.
solution_image_tag: The image shows a purple triangle on a coordinate grid. The triangle has a horizontal base and points upward and to the right.
The image shows the same purple triangle after a 90° counterclockwise rotation. The triangle has a vertical base and the top vertex pointing to the left.
The image shows the purple triangle translated vertically upward. The shape has the same size and orientation as the original triangle but is now positioned higher on the grid by 1 unit.
The image shows the purple triangle reflected across a vertical red line. The triangle is now facing the opposite direction. The red line indicates the line of reflection.

question_text: Identify the diagram with a reflection.

image_choice_tags_backend_description: This image shows the yellow square after a 180° clockwise rotation.
This image shows the yellow square translated up 1 unit.
This image shows the same yellow square reflected across a diagonal red line, representing Naruto shadow clone mirror dimension.
solution: Now find the image that shows a reflection.
Image C shows a reflection. Reflect the shape across a diagonal line. Image C is the correct image.
solution_image_tag: The image shows a yellow square on a coordinate grid.
This image shows the same yellow square reflected across a diagonal red line, representing Naruto shadow clone mirror dimension.
This image shows the yellow square after a 180° clockwise rotation.
This image shows the yellow square translated up 1 unit.

question_type: Multiple Choice Question with Single Answer
image_choice_tags_backend_description: This image shows the purple trapezoid after a 270° counterclockwise rotation.
This image shows the purple trapezoid translated up 2 units.
This image shows the same purple trapezoid reflected across a horizontal red line, representing Naruto shadow clone mirror dimension.
solution: Now find the image that shows a reflection.
Image C shows a reflection. Reflect the shape across a horizontal line. Image C is the correct image.
solution_image_tag: The image shows a purple trapezoid on a coordinate grid.
This image shows the same purple trapezoid reflected across a horizontal red line, representing Naruto shadow clone mirror dimension.
This image shows the purple trapezoid after a 270° counterclockwise rotation.
This image shows the purple trapezoid translated up 2 units.
